Q1. Subtract (F2C)16 - (7B)16 and give the result in decimal
3761

Q2. Multiply (2F)16 * (13)16 and give the result in decimal and hexadecimal
893, 37D

Q3. Convert (FACE)16 to binary
1111101011001110

Q4. Convert the decimal number 54321 to hexadecimal and octal
D431, 154061
